product_name: Smith I/O Photochromic Snow Goggles - Asian Fit - Men's
long_description: As the original interchangeable goggles, the Asian-fit Smith I/O Photochromic Snow Goggles are the standard by which all other goggles are measured for comfort and clarity on the slopes.
short_description: As the original interchangeable goggles, the Asian-fit Smith I/O Photochromic Snow Goggles are the standard by which all other goggles are measured for comfort and clarity on the slopes.
